entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET Core 8 Identity Endpoints not compatible with FallbackPolicy that requires authenticated users by default #56885
  • An unhandled exception of type 'System.ArgumentException' occurred in Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.dll: 'The path must be absolute.' #56883
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #56882
  • ArgumentNullException when requesting a Razor Page #56879
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mvc #56870

Closed

  • [Epic] Improve the Data Protection experience for apps with multiple instances #53654
    9.0.0
  • Failures in Mvc.Template Tests #56828
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #56860
  • Blazor Server page with login workflow embedded within an Iframe return to login screen even after successful authentication #56874
  • ValidateAuthenticationStateAsync manual trigger #56859
  • dotnet restore >NU1301> Interruption in project build due to external dependency failure #56873
  • Allow deletion of Data Protection keys #53880

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove downlevel runtimes from SiteExtensions package #56884
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56881
    area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56880
    area-mvc, 8.0.x
  • Add ClaimData for AuthenticationStateData and fix overtrimming #56878
    area-blazor
  • Increase quarantine pr timeout #56871
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add an explanatory comment to DuplexPipe #56863
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Update Microsoft.IDWeb dependencies #56877
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use minified .js files from submodule in source-build #56864
    area-blazor
  • Support for Pushed Authorization (PAR) in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • mark verified files as lf and utf8 #56643
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add an option on the `ExceptionHandlerOptions` to select status codes based on exceptions #56616
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Allow Response Caching for Authorized Endpoints #56768
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Use Ascii.ToUtf16 in StringUtilities #56578
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
